alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Colorado; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 17 at 11:52AM CST until February 17 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Red Flag Conditions for Areas West of the San Bernard River... .Due to moderate northwesterly winds combining with low relative humidity values this afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR LOW RH AND GUSTY WINDS FOR AREAS WEST OF THE SAN BERNARD RIVER... The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 8 PM CST this evening. * AFFECTED COUNTIES... Colorado...Wharton...Inland Jackson... Inland Matagorda...Coastal Jackson...Coastal Matagorda. * WIND...Northwesterly winds up to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph this afternoon. * HUMIDITY...Falling to 20 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create explosive fire growth potential.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jackson; Coastal Matagorda; Colorado; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton
